mapper.select:
select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.acceptance_no , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.form_state , t1.apply_by , t1.apply_by_dept , t1.reconstruction_no , t1.device_name , t1.unified_id , t1.secret_level , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.competent_chief_engineer , t1.owner_dept , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_tel , t1.sets_count , t1.unit_price , t1.project_director , t1.device_category , t1.if_regular_check , t1.if_spot_check , t1.if_precision_inspection , t1.if_upkeep , t1.upkeep_cycle , t1.upkeep_requirements , t1.next_upkeep_date , t1.if_measure , t1.if_install , t1.if_measure_onsite , t1.measure_identify , t1.measure_by , t1.metering_date , t1.metering_cycle , t1.position_id , t1.if_has_computer , t1.is_safety_production , t1.financial_resources , t1.belong_project , t1.project_no , t1.reply_name , t1.project_approval_no , t1.abc_category , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from assets_recon_acceptance t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.ACCEPTANCE_NO like concat(concat('%',#{bean.acceptanceNo}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByDept}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.FORM_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.formState}),'%')
and t1.APPLY_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.applyBy}),'%')
and t1.APPLY_BY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.applyByDept}),'%')
and t1.RECONSTRUCTION_NO like concat(concat('%',#{bean.reconstructionNo}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceName}),'%')
and t1.UNIFIED_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unifiedId}),'%')
and t1.SECRET_LEVEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.secretLevel}),'%')
and t1.MANUFACTURER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.manufacturerId}),'%')
and t1.COMPETENT_CHIEF_ENGINEER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.competentChiefEngineer}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerDept}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerId}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_TEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerTel}),'%')
and t1.SETS_COUNT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.setsCount}),'%')
and t1.UNIT_PRICE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unitPrice}),'%')
and t1.PROJECT_DIRECTOR like concat(concat('%',#{bean.projectDirector}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_CATEGORY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceCategory}),'%')
and t1.IF_REGULAR_CHECK like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ifRegularCheck}),'%')
and t1.IF_SPOT_CHECK like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ifSpotCheck}),'%')
and t1.IF_PRECISION_INSPECTION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ifPrecisionInspection}),'%')
and t1.IF_UPKEEP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ifUpkeep}),'%')
and t1.UPKEEP_CYCLE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.upkeepCycle}),'%')
and t1.UPKEEP_REQUIREMENTS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.upkeepRequirements}),'%')
and t1.NEXT_UPKEEP_DATE >= #{bean.nextUpkeepDateBegin}
and t1.NEXT_UPKEEP_DATE <= #{bean.nextUpkeepDateEnd}
and t1.IF_MEASURE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ifMeasure}),'%')
and t1.IF_INSTALL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ifInstall}),'%')
and t1.IF_MEASURE_ONSITE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ifMeasureOnsite}),'%')
and t1.MEASURE_IDENTIFY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.measureIdentify}),'%')
and t1.MEASURE_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.measureBy}),'%')
and t1.METERING_DATE >= #{bean.meteringDateBegin}
and t1.METERING_DATE <= #{bean.meteringDateEnd}
and t1.METERING_CYCLE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.meteringCycle}),'%')
and t1.POSITION_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.positionId}),'%')
and t1.IF_HAS_COMPUTER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ifHasComputer}),'%')
and t1.IS_SAFETY_PRODUCTION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isSafetyProduction}),'%')
and t1.FINANCIAL_RESOURCES like concat(concat('%',#{bean.financialResources}),'%')
and t1.BELONG_PROJECT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.belongProject}),'%')
and t1.PROJECT_NO like concat(concat('%',#{bean.projectNo}),'%')
and t1.REPLY_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.replyName}),'%')
and t1.PROJECT_APPROVAL_NO like concat(concat('%',#{bean.projectApprovalNo}),'%')
and t1.ABC_CATEGORY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.abcCategory}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute03}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute04}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute05}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute06}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute07}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute08}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute09}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute10}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute11}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute12}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_16 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute16}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_17 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute17}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_18 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute18}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_19 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute19}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_21 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute21}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_22 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute22}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_23 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute23}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_24 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute24}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_25 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute25}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_26 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute26}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_27 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute27}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_28 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute28}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_29 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute29}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_30 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute30}),'%')
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.acceptance_no , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.form_state , t1.apply_by , t1.apply_by_dept , t1.reconstruction_no , t1.device_name , t1.unified_id , t1.secret_level , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.competent_chief_engineer , t1.owner_dept , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_tel , t1.sets_count , t1.unit_price , t1.project_director , t1.device_category , t1.if_regular_check , t1.if_spot_check , t1.if_precision_inspection , t1.if_upkeep , t1.upkeep_cycle , t1.upkeep_requirements , t1.next_upkeep_date , t1.if_measure , t1.if_install , t1.if_measure_onsite , t1.measure_identify , t1.measure_by , t1.metering_date , t1.metering_cycle , t1.position_id , t1.if_has_computer , t1.is_safety_production , t1.financial_resources , t1.belong_project , t1.project_no , t1.reply_name , t1.project_approval_no , t1.abc_category , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from assets_recon_acceptance t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_

select t1.id , t1.acceptance_no , t1.created_by , t1.created_by_dept , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.form_state , t1.apply_by , t1.apply_by_dept , t1.reconstruction_no , t1.device_name , t1.unified_id , t1.secret_level , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.competent_chief_engineer , t1.owner_dept , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_tel , t1.sets_count , t1.unit_price , t1.project_director , t1.device_category , t1.if_regular_check , t1.if_spot_check , t1.if_precision_inspection , t1.if_upkeep , t1.upkeep_cycle , t1.upkeep_requirements , t1.next_upkeep_date , t1.if_measure , t1.if_install , t1.if_measure_onsite , t1.measure_identify , t1.measure_by , t1.metering_date , t1.metering_cycle , t1.position_id , t1.if_has_computer , t1.is_safety_production , t1.financial_resources , t1.belong_project , t1.project_no , t1.reply_name , t1.project_approval_no , t1.abc_category , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 from assets_recon_acceptance t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into assets_recon_acceptance
id,
acceptance_no,
created_by,
created_by_dept,
creation_date,
last_updated_by,
last_update_date,
last_update_ip,
version,
form_state,
apply_by,
apply_by_dept,
reconstruction_no,
device_name,
unified_id,
secret_level,
manufacturer_id,
competent_chief_engineer,
owner_dept,
owner_id,
owner_tel,
sets_count,
unit_price,
project_director,
device_category,
if_regular_check,
if_spot_check,
if_precision_inspection,
if_upkeep,
upkeep_cycle,
upkeep_requirements,
next_upkeep_date,
if_measure,
if_install,
if_measure_onsite,
measure_identify,
measure_by,
metering_date,
metering_cycle,
position_id,
if_has_computer,
is_safety_production,
financial_resources,
belong_project,
project_no,
reply_name,
project_approval_no,
abc_category,
attribute_01,
attribute_02,
attribute_03,
attribute_04,
attribute_05,
attribute_06,
attribute_07,
attribute_08,
attribute_09,
attribute_10,
attribute_11,
attribute_12,
attribute_13,
attribute_14,
attribute_15,
attribute_16,
attribute_17,
attribute_18,
attribute_19,
attribute_20,
attribute_21,
attribute_22,
attribute_23,
attribute_24,
attribute_25,
attribute_26,
attribute_27,
attribute_28,
attribute_29,
attribute_30,

#{creationDate},
